abstract: The legal outcome could help protect Amgen’s multibillion dollar anemia drug franchise in the U.S. by blocking Roche’s plan to introduce a competing medicine.
snippet: The legal outcome could help protect Amgen’s multibillion dollar anemia drug franchise in the U.S. by blocking Roche’s plan to introduce a competing medicine.
lead_paragraph: Amgen won a decisive victory yesterday in a closely watched patent infringement lawsuit against Roche.

headline.main: Amgen Wins Patent Battle Over Roche’s Anemia Drug
headline.print_headline: Amgen Wins Patent Battle Over Roche’s Anemia Drug
